data.title: Film Stories presents: In The Bleak Midwinter + live podcast Q&A with Kenneth Branagh
data.meta_description:
A rare screening of Sir Kenneth Branagh’s Christmas film. Made in 1995 he paid for it himself, shot it quickly, and for those who got to see it, it’s a festive comedy treat. Sir Kenneth will be on-stage afterwards for a live podcast recording about it. 

This is an event with limited
data.text:
A rare screening of Sir Kenneth Branagh’s Christmas film. Made in 1995 he paid for it himself, shot it quickly, and for those who got to see it, it’s a festive comedy treat. Sir Kenneth will be on-stage afterwards for a live podcast recording about it.

This is an event with limited tickets. For one night only. When they’re gone, they’re gone.

Profits from the event will be going to the charity Centrepoint.
